sentence: (WHTM) – A new Fox News poll shows former hedge fund CEO Dave McCormick taking a nine point lead in the race to represent Pennsylvania in the United States Senate.
author: George Stockburger
title: McCormick, Oz lead Fox News Poll of Pa. Senate race

sentence: (McCormick Senate campaign) "The bigoted attacks my opponent Dave McCormick has made against me as the child of immigrants are reminiscent of slurs made in the past about Catholics and Jews," Oz told Fox News.
author: Brooke Singman
title: Dr. Oz will renounce his Turkish citizenship if elected to Senate: 'I will only be a U.S. citizen'

sentence: Ingraham was critical of the endorsement, calling it a “mistake.” She asked Conway, who endorsed Republican Dave McCormick in Pennsylvania, if it was an error by Trump and Hannity to endorse Oz several times.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: Laura Ingraham unafraid to hit Trump and Hannity for endorsing Dr. Oz: ‘I’ll say it…it was a mistake’
